text:
@realDonaldTrump 1.9m+ known COVID-19 cases.

109k+ known COVID-19 deaths.

Massive protests nationwide, coast to coast against systemic racism in the police force.

& THE PRESIDENT SPENDS ALL DAY ON SOCIAL MEDIA, FANNING THE FLAMES❓❓❓❓❓

Making the WH into a fortress will achieve nothing.
